page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT AROUND CARNOUSTIE
page.content: The adults of this area follow a wide variety of careers and employment. Many are connected in some way with the{oil industry,}working either with shore-based companies or on an off-shore basis. The neighbouring city of{Dundee}is the headquarters of a{newspaper}which has a wide circulation in central Scotland. This gives employment to a large number of Carnoustie people. Also in{Dundee}is a large, modern {teaching hospital,}where many local women work. The{University of Dundee}attracts many people as lecturers, technicians etc. Many of them are employed in the ever-expanding computer department. To the East of Carnoustie is the town of{Arbroath.}Several firms there have local people on their staff.
